mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods ( product_id, number, `name`, price, title, keyword, subscription, logo_url, logo_real_url, content, update_time ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{number}, #{name}, #{price}, #{title}, #{keyword}, #{subscription}, #{logoUrl}, #{logoRealUrl}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT g.id 'id', t.`name` 'tradeName', b.`name` 'brandName', p.`name` 'productName', g.`name` 'name', g.logo_url 'logoUrl', g.update_time 'updateTime' FROM goods g LEFT JOIN product p ON g.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN brand b ON p.brand_id = b.id LEFT JOIN trade t ON b.trade_id = t.id LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}

SELECT g.id 'id', t.id 'tradeId', b.id 'brandId', p.id 'productId', g.`name` 'name', g.price 'price', g.title 'title', g.keyword 'keyword', g.subscription 'subscription', g.logo_real_url 'logoRealUrl', g.logo_url 'logoUrl', g.content 'content', g.update_time 'updateTime' FROM goods g LEFT JOIN product p ON g.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN brand b ON p.brand_id = b.id LEFT JOIN trade t ON b.trade_id = t.id WHERE g.id = #{id}
